languages.text: "Завет Паутины учит не сомневаться в себе и участи, Им уготованной. Не ведать страха. Не сожалеть. Я... почти сошла с верной нити. Но ты, Домин'{name}, мне не позволил{mf||а}. Прими мою благодарность".

"The Tenets teach us to be without doubt and trust the fate He has chosen for us. We must not know fear. We must not feel regret. I... I came close to abandoning the truth. But you did not let me, Domin'{name}. Please accept my gratitude."
languages.original_text: "Завет Паутины учит не сомневаться в себе и участи, Им уготованной. Не ведать страха. Не сожалеть. Я... почти сошла с верной нити. Но ты, Домин'{name}, мне не позволил{mf||а}. Прими мою благодарность".

traits.locale_text: "Ahn'shini teaches us not to doubt ourselves or the fate He has chosen for us. To know no fear. No regret. I... I had almost betrayed the Way. But you, Enim'{name}, did not let me. Please accept my gratitude."

"Ahn'shini teaches us not to doubt ourselves or the fate He has chosen for us. To know no fear. No regret. I... I had almost betrayed the Way. But you, Enim'{name}, did not let me. Please accept my gratitude."

"Ahn'shini teaches us to be without doubt and trust the fate He has chosen for us. We must not know fear. We must not feel regret. I... I came close to abandoning the Way. But you did not let me, Enim'{name}. Please accept my gratitude."

"Ahn'shini teaches us to be without doubt and trust the fate He has chosen for us. We must not know fear. We must not feel regret. I... I came close to abandoning the Way. But you did not let me, Enim'{name}. Please accept my gratitude."

"The Tenets teach us to be without doubt and trust the fate He has chosen for us. We must not know fear. We must not feel regret. I... I came close to abandoning the truth. But you did not let me, Domin'{name}. Please accept my gratitude."

"The Tenets teach us to be without doubt and trust the fate He has chosen for us. We must not know fear. We must not feel regret. I... I came close to abandoning the truth. But you did not let me, Domin'{name}. Please accept my gratitude."

languages.text: «La Doctrina nos enseña a no albergar ninguna duda y a confiar en el destino que Él nos ha encomendado. No debemos conocer el miedo. No debemos sentir remordimiento. Yo... estuve a punto de abandonar la verdad. Pero usted no lo permitió, Domin'{name}. Y le debo gratitud por ello».
languages.original_text: "The Tenets teach us to be without doubt and trust the fate He has chosen for us. We must not know fear. We must not feel regret. I... I came close to abandoning the truth. But you did not let me, Domin'{name}. Please accept my gratitude."

traits.locale_text: «La Doctrina nos enseña a no albergar ninguna duda y a confiar en el destino que Él nos ha encomendado. No debemos conocer el miedo. No debemos sentir remordimiento. Yo... estuve a punto de abandonar la verdad. Pero usted no lo permitió, Domin'{name}. Y le debo gratitud por ello».

languages.text: 「教義は、疑いを持たず、主が私たちに選んでくださった運命を信じることを教えてくださる。恐れを知ってなならない。後悔を感じてはならない。私は…危うく真実を捨てるところだった。けれど、あなたがそうさせなかった、ドミン・{name}。どうか、私の感謝を受け取って」
languages.original_text: "The Tenets teach us to be without doubt and trust the fate He has chosen for us. We must not know fear. We must not feel regret. I... I came close to abandoning the truth. But you did not let me, Domin'{name}. Please accept my gratitude."

traits.locale_text: 「教義は、疑いを持たず、主が私たちに選んでくださった運命を信じることを教えてくださる。恐れを知ってなならない。後悔を感じてはならない。私は…危うく真実を捨てるところだった。けれど、あなたがそうさせなかった、ドミン・{name}。どうか、私の感謝を受け取って」

languages.text: “根据教义的教导，我们要相信祂为我们安排的命运，决不能带有一丝犹疑。我们不应了解何为恐惧，也不应了解何为悔恨。我……我差点就背离了真理，但你阻止了我，秘者{name}。请接受我的感激之情。”
languages.original_text: "The Tenets teach us to be without doubt and trust the fate He has chosen for us. We must not know fear. We must not feel regret. I... I came close to abandoning the truth. But you did not let me, Domin'{name}. Please accept my gratitude."

traits.locale_text: “根据教义的教导，我们要相信祂为我们安排的命运，决不能带有一丝犹疑。我们不应了解何为恐惧，也不应了解何为悔恨。我……我差点就背离了真理，但你阻止了我，秘者{name}。请接受我的感激之情。”

languages.text: "Die Grundsätze lehren uns, ohne Zweifel dem Schicksal zu vertrauen, das Er für uns gewählt hat. Wir dürfen keine Angst kennen. Wir dürfen keine Reue spüren. Ich ... ich stand kurz davor, mich von der Wahrheit abzuwenden. Aber Ihr habt es nicht zugelassen, Domin'{name}. Bitte nehmt dafür meinen Dank an."
languages.original_text: "The Tenets teach us to be without doubt and trust the fate He has chosen for us. We must not know fear. We must not feel regret. I... I came close to abandoning the truth. But you did not let me, Domin'{name}. Please accept my gratitude."

traits.locale_text: "Die Grundsätze lehren uns, ohne Zweifel dem Schicksal zu vertrauen, das Er für uns gewählt hat. Wir dürfen keine Angst kennen. Wir dürfen keine Reue spüren. Ich ... ich stand kurz davor, mich von der Wahrheit abzuwenden. Aber Ihr habt es nicht zugelassen, Domin'{name}. Bitte nehmt dafür meinen Dank an."

languages.text: « Les Préceptes nous invitent à laisser de côté nos doutes pour nous en remettre entièrement au destin qu'Il a choisi pour nous. Nous ne devons pas céder à la peur. Nous ne devons pas nous laisser ronger par le regret. Je... J'ai bien failli renoncer à la vérité, mais vous m'en avez empêchée et je vous en remercie, Domin'{name}. »
languages.original_text: "The Tenets teach us to be without doubt and trust the fate He has chosen for us. We must not know fear. We must not feel regret. I... I came close to abandoning the truth. But you did not let me, Domin'{name}. Please accept my gratitude."

traits.locale_text: « Les Préceptes nous invitent à laisser de côté nos doutes pour nous en remettre entièrement au destin qu'Il a choisi pour nous. Nous ne devons pas céder à la peur. Nous ne devons pas nous laisser ronger par le regret. Je... J'ai bien failli renoncer à la vérité, mais vous m'en avez empêchée et je vous en remercie, Domin'{name}. »

languages.original_text: "The Tenets teach us to be without doubt and trust the fate He has chosen for us. We must not know fear. We must not feel regret. I... I came close to abandoning the truth. But you did not let me, Domin'. Please accept my gratitude."

languages.text: "İlkeler bize kuşkudan uzak durmamızı, O'nun bizim için seçtiği kadere güvenmemizi öğretir. Korku nedir bilmemeliyiz. Pişmanlıktan anlamamalıyız. Az kalsın... Az kalsın hakikat yolundan çıkacaktım. Neyse ki buna müsaade etmedin Domin'{name}. Sana teşekkürü borç bilirim."
languages.original_text: "The Tenets teach us to be without doubt and trust the fate He has chosen for us. We must not know fear. We must not feel regret. I... I came close to abandoning the truth. But you did not let me, Domin'{name}. Please accept my gratitude."
